item.title: About
item.description: My Team I am a DevOps engineer apprenctice in Hack IT and Whip IT team within Universal Credit, DWP digital. We are the DevOps team that build and support infrastructure for products and projects on Burbank and UC platforms. We work closely with the Feature Teams in Leeds and Manchester. We are currently using the scrum framework to organise and manage our work. That means we have decide on sprint tickets in week/two week blocks, have daily scrum meetings as well as retrospectives.
